org.webcurator.domain
Class Pagination

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
          org.webcurator.domain.Pagination
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class Pagination
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport

Pagination object makes all the decisions about the pagination of result sets, to help display them in a page by page manner.

Author:
bprice

Constructor that accepts the query params and page number to display.

Parameters:
query - The query to run.
aPage - the page number to return.
aPageSize - the size of the page to return

public Pagination(java.lang.String cntQuery,

                  java.util.Map aParams,
                  int aPage,
                  int aPageSize,
                  boolean isNamedQuery,
                  org.hibernate.SessionFactory aSessionFactory)
Constructor that accepts the query params and page number to display.

Parameters:
aQuery - query.
aParams - the query parameters.
aPage - the page number to return.
aPageSize - the size of the page to return
isNamedQuery - true if the query is a named query
aSessionFactory - the session factory to use with the pagination object
